title: Chintz fragments
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  Mordants for 3 reds and 2 purples applied over resist by pen and brush.  Madder dyed.  Blue applied over resist by immersion.  Yellow applied by brush over blue. (chintz)
description: Three fragments of a floral spray on a speckled red ground. Component C may come from a different piece.
name: Chintz fragments
